text: Burhan Kuzu (1 January 1955 - 1 November 2020) was a Turkish politician. He was born in Kayseri, Turkey. He was a former deputy in the Turkish Parliament from 2002 to 2018 representing the Justice and Development Party. Kuzu died of COVID-19 on 1 November 2020 in Istanbul, aged 65. == Reference == Category:1955 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Turkish politicians Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Istanbul
title: Burhan Kuzu
